bpp/descriptor.name: Adya
bpp/descriptor.long_desc: Adya is a universal open-source platform for commerce and supply chain. With its Platform-as-a-Service and integration-Platform-as-a-service capabilities, Siva is a truly interoperable solution, with more than 100 ready-made solutions at the door.

descriptor.name: Adya Retail Store
descriptor.short_desc: Adya Retail Store is helpful for merchants to sell their products.
descriptor.long_desc: Adya Retail Store is helpful for merchants to sell their products.

descriptor.name: Milk
descriptor.long_desc: Akshayakalpa Organic Cow Milk (UHT)– 1 Ltr - Pure antibiotic-free milk, long-shelf life, No chemical residues, convenient and ready-to-use.

descriptor.name: Super Garam Masala Powder
descriptor.long_desc: Garam masala consists of ground spices like cloves, cinnamon, cardamoms, cumin, coriander, nutmeg, bay leaf, mace and black pepper. Some versions even consist of fennel seeds, red chilies and black cardamoms.

descriptor.name: Fresho Capsicum - Green (Loose), 250 g
descriptor.long_desc:
Leaving a moderately pungent taste on the tongue, Green capsicums, also known as green peppers are bell shaped, medium-sized fruit pods.
They have thick and shiny skin with a fleshy texture inside.
